title: WE ARE LEASING! Offering in person tours  TODAY!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Saddlewood Park Townhomes!', 'We have beautiful 2 bedroom townhomes available, starting at $1,999.00', "*** Don't let Social Distancing keep you from finding your new home!", 'We would love to set up an in person tour at your convenience, or you can visit our website and do a virtual tour!', '***', 'Click the link below for a 3D tour of our 3 bedroom model!', '<URL>', 'Click the link below for a 3D tour of our 2 bedroom model!', '<URL>', 'Starting at $1,999.00 per month, 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms, 1,382 square feet.', 'The bedrooms are a great size with large walk- in closets.', "Spacious Townhome with 1 Car Garage, Huge Walk-In Closets, Private Patio, Just Minutes to Lake Minnetonka, and in Minnetonka's School District!", 'Pets Welcome!', 'The kitchens are packed with fun amenities such as; a lazy susan for pots and pans, built in cutting board, breakfast bar that is perfect for stools, and of course dishwasher, garbage disposal, and self cleaning oven.', 'Each home also has an 8ft deep pantry, that offers great storage space.', 'A washer and dryer is also included!', 'We pay for water, sewer, trash, lawn care, and snow removal.', 'You would be responsible for gas and electricity.', 'This home is equipped with central air and gas forced heat.', 'Pets welcome!', "There is a beautiful nature trail that's perfect for dog walking!", 'Quiet neighborhood, ideal location....this is a beautiful property!', 'Spacious and private patios, located in a scenic upscale neighborhood.', 'These are just a few of the features we offer here at Saddlewood Park.', 'We are connected to the Minnetonka Loop Trail System.', 'Take a walk or stroll to all of the shops at Westwind Plaza!', 'Dairy Queen, Cub Foods, Chipotle and the new Noodles & Company just to name a few.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Allow Cats, Dogs up to 80 Lbs., with Some Breed Restrictions', 'Deposit $100-$400', 'Plus 1-time Pet Rent', 'DESCRIPTION', '________________________________________', 'These are spacious two-level townhomes.', 'These homes feature an open floorplan with 2 bedrooms and 1.5 baths, a patio and a large 1 car garage.', 'Beautiful area, close to trails, shopping, schools, Lake Minnetonka, Highway 7, Crosstown, 494 and 169.', 'At Saddlewood Park Townhomes you will enjoy city convenience and country quiet.', 'The Minnetonka Loop Trail is just outside your front door!', 'RENTAL FEATURES', '________________________________________', 'Breakfast nook - Dining room - Living room - Pantry - Storage space - Walk-in closet - Dishwasher - Dryer - Garbage disposal - Refrigerator - Stove/Oven - Washer - Balcony, Deck, or Patio - Pond - Air conditioning - Central A/C - Central heat - Double pane windows - Cable-ready - Garage - Detached - Off-street parking - On-street parking', '________________________________________', 'LEASE TERMS', '13-15 month lease', '12 month lease available, check with community Manager', '________________________________________', '16863 Saddlewood Trail, Minnetonka, MN, 55345', 'Minnetonka, Plymouth, Maple Grove, Eden Prairie, Hopkins, Excelsior, Shorewood, Groveland, Minnetonka Middle School East, Minnetonka High School, dogs, trails, biking, running, walking, woods, Wayzata, Waconia, Minnetrista, Minnetonka School District, Lake Minnetonka, Golden Valley, New Hope, 2
